text: Tridrepana lunulata is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Arthur Gardiner Butler in 1887. It is found in Indonesia, Papua New Guinea and Australia, where it has been recorded from northern Queensland. The wingspan is about 25 mm. The wings are yellow with brown patches on the forewings. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1887 Category:Drepaninae
title: Tridrepana lunulata
